This ring is so cute!  It is a larger ring than I usually wear but it is still comfortable.  I love the design and the deep purple gemstones.  It is festive and clearly works for Halloween but it is subtle enough that it can be worn year round.  I ordered a size 5 and it is true to size.

The ring fits as described. It has great attention to detail with the skull and bones on it. Skull eyes have gems in them too. The colors look great with each other. The gem on it sparkles magnificently. I am concerned that it may show notable damage if it takes some good hits, and the tiny skull eye gems look like they can fall off with enough force.
My wife has been wearing this for a few months. She is hyper sensitive to poor quality metals and has had zero issues. The coating onnthe ring has also held up.

So I got this ring hoping to wear it with a necklace I have that looks similar. For the most part, the ring looks exactly as advertised with the only difference being that the eyes of the skulls are orange, not red like the stone on top. In spite of that, the ring was very comfortable and didn't feel heavy. I wore it for 8 straight hours and the plating kept my finger from turning green. However, I did notice a part on the ring near the gem where the plating was already coming off, so I wouldn't recommended wearing this ring all the time if you want it to last.
The Ring is not too heavy but heavy, feels almost as if it’s worth a few hundred

This is a nice little “goth” ring. It looks exactly as pictured in the product listing. It seems to be well made of quality materials. It seems to fit true to size. I had no issues with this ring turning my skin green like cheaper metal rings, even with frequent hand washing. It seems fairly sturdy as well.
The medium shade of red goes perfectly with the dark gray shiny metal. I love the skulls. It fit perfectly. It fit great! And it was so cheap!
It is a beautiful ring.  Well made and interesting to look at.  I have received many compliments on it.

It’s a very cheap ring but it does not look it. It’s beautiful and stone is shiny and so pretty. The only issue is, it’s fragile. A tiny stone fell out after about 30 minutes of wearing it. Luckily I saw it sitting there otherwise, it’s so small I never would have found it. I put it back in place with clear nail polish and coated the entire ring 2-3 times except for the large stone. It’s keeping the paint from chipping which it did start too a little but it’s not noticeable. Even with the nail polish it’s still not an every day ring if you want it to last any amount of time. It will last for Halloween but I’m not sure how long I will survive passed that.
I love this ring. If I were preposed to with this ring, it would be my favorite. I absolutely love this ring and wear it daily. I am so obsessed that I bought both colors of rings.
